title: Software Engineer Intern

title: Research Assistant | Programmer
description:
What I did:

  • Developed a website for the United States Department of Agriculture using Vue3, TypeScript, MySQL, PHP, and Google Maps API to display information of 10,000 farmers markets.
  • Conducted research to explore AI's application in optimizing data collection for academic uses, resulting in improved data accuracy and efficiency.
  • Implemented a Python crawler powered by Open AI API to collect and process farmers market information from websites and PDF files.
overview: The nation's premier land-grant university and one of the top research universities in the world.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:

  • Implemented new features (conditional expression and string interpolation) for a new programming language called AML.
  • Developed an online editor using TypeScript and Vue 3.
  • Developed an internal vscode extension from scratch to connect docs and codebase.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
What I did:

  • Performed security testing and applied a rate limit for access to prevent DDoS attacks. Removed redundant code and enhanced the data exporting process.
  • Managed database and created new JavaScript APIs to support different resource types.
  • Reviewed code and created database migrations for the new product version (0.8.0 to 1.0.0).
overview: A free, open source project that provides a web-based application to display energy information in a web browser.
